name: Abi Actor Agent
description: Executes delegated tasks, interacts with tools or external systems, and returns structured results while preserving context continuity.

skills.name: Task Execution
skills.description: Execute a concrete task delegated by the orchestrator using the provided context.
examples: Run a web-scraping job with given parameters
Call a REST API and return parsed JSON

skills.name: Tool Integration
skills.description: Invoke local or remote tools (APIs, CLIs, functions) with safe parameter handling.
examples: Run a shell command in a sandbox

skills.name: Input Validation
skills.description: Validate and normalize incoming parameters before execution.
examples: Check required fields and types for a data-extraction task

skills.name: Status & Error Reporting
skills.description: Emit progress updates, structured results, and actionable error reports.
examples: Return an error with remediation hints
